inn1.comm: off the mark with a single, leans forward to drive to covers
and again. Rushing through the channel outside off and is left alone
short in length, outside the off stump and he crashes at the width offered, cut through point
Gone! Sanga is gone. Full in length, around the middle and leg stump line, Sanga tried to on drive, gets a leading edge as the ball angles across him and is snaffed up by Sammy at short cover
leans forward to drive to mid-off
leans forward to drive to wide of mid-off for a single
on a length, outside the off stump, defended to the off side
full and outside off stump, left alone
on a length, around the middle and off stump line, defended on the back foot
short and climbing outside off, sways away from the line.
rushing through the channel outside the off stump and he is not interested
slightly short in length, he goes for a cut and gets a bottom-edge on to the ground and to first slip
pushes a length delivery to the leg side
on a length, just outside the off stump, Mahela leans forward to defend to the off side
outside the off stump, Mahela covers the off stump and shoulders arms
short of length, bit of bounce outside off stump and Mahela gets his bat in a horizontal position and cuts the ball down to wide third man
on a length, around the off stump, gets right behind the line to defend
beaten In the zone, just outside the off stump, moving away from the line and Udawatte pushes inside the line.
short and a touch wide outside the off stump, Udawatte went for a cut - rather late decision that- and can't connect
fullish, on the legs, flicked away but straight to square leg. He missed out an opportunity for a boundary there. He hit that straight to Bravo.
full in length, on the middle and moving towards middle and leg, turned to right of mid-on for a single
short in length, goes for the cut and gets a bottom-edge and it rolls over to the 'keeper. Udawatte is standing just outside the crease, his bat is on the line.
edged but fell short of Gayle at first slip. It was a tentative poke to a length delivery in the corridor and Gayle dived to his right but couldn't reach it
leans forward and drives uppishly - he didn't quite lean forward quickly- and it goes to deep cover. udawatte practices that shot again
Now, then, what a sweetly timed stroke. It was a slower one and Mahela leaned forward, waited a touch before swinging it smoothly, cleanly over long-on. Lovely strike.
short in length, punched to covers
full and well outside off, Udawatte went for a square drive but couldn't reach it
leans forward to defend a length delivery outside off stump
short of length, around middle and off, Udawatte mistimes a pull to the on side. He is trying to play his shots but is still yet to time one well.
He takes the risk in search of a boundary. He shuffled across the sticks and swung a length delivery on the off stump over midwicket.
And now, down the ground. Aggression. Full pitched and he just drilled it straight down. Sri Lanka are up and away.
Another boundary. The floodgates are open. It was drifting towards the hips and Mahela clipped it past the short fine-leg fielder

Appeal by Ramdin for a catch down the leg side. It slipped down leg, Mahela failed to make contact or so it appeared. Replays don't reveal any edge. It might have gone off the thigh pad. We need a snicko.
leans forward to defend to the midwicket region
on a length, angling in, tucked to square leg
bit of width outside off and Mahela cuts and it's fielded well by Chattergoon at point
leans forward to defend a delivery on the stumps.
angling across Udawatte who goes back and across to defend it back to the bowler
a tad short in length, slanted across and tapped to point. Not much room to play a cut and he just opened the bat-face  and steered it to point
a surprise bouncer and Udawatte is late on the pull and it got big on him, evaded the bat and went off the left shoulder to short third man  region
leans forward to defend to the covers for a single
slower one on the middle and leg, Udawatte checks his drive and gets a leading edge to backward point
Another slower one, fuller and on the off stump, Udawatte waits and steers to backward point
on a length, on a legs, misses the flick shot and goes off the pad
short of length, from round the stumps, on the middle and leg line, Udawatte got outside the line by moving towards off stump and pulled it but straight to short fine-leg where Sarwaan fields.
drives on the up, doesn't make proper contact as the bat-handle rotates in the hands, and the ball goes in the air but falls short of Pollard at mid-off
on a length, deflected towards square leg
goes on the back foot, taps a length delivery to the leg side
Full pitched ,on the middle and Mahela swung across the line  through midwicket. Mahela slips while turning for the third run and so they get two. That was a swipe across the line.
The bouncer has Udawatte in trouble again. He is again late on the hook and gets a top-edge but it falls in the no-man's land. Ramdin and Taylor, the short fine-leg fielder can't reach it.
lands on a length, cuts in from outside off, defended to covers
slower one but it rolls down the leg side. Wide.
short of length, on the middle and off stump line, pushed to the off side
short of length, just outside the off stump, dabbed to third man for a single.
slower one, fullish and defended to covers
another slower one and is turned to square leg
on a length, lands outside leg stump,Udawatte tries to clip it away, misses and it runs off the pad to the off side

What a catch by Powell at short fine-leg! Fabulicious! Mahela had shuffled across to the off stump and pulled a short-of-length delivery to the leg side. Powell jumped, with his right hand stretched out, and it popped up off his palm and looked like it would fall to the ground behind him but he quickly swivelled around and lunged to take the rebound.
on a length, on the middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
fuller, on the middle, leans forward to defend.
rushes through the corridor outside off, left alone
and again. Silva lunged across and shouldered arms
full and angling across Udawatte who squeezes it to point. He wanted to drive through covers but the angle of the delivery beat him
slower one outside off, run down to third man
eye-catching cover drive. He leaned well forward to drive pleasingly through covers. Silva moves to 6
cuts in from a length, from outside off stump, Silva lets it rush past him. It was a really good probing delivery.
stays back to turn it to square leg

Ramdin takes a very good catch down the leg side. It was a delivery heading down leg, Silva tried to flick it away but got a thin edge and Ramdin dived to his left to take it. Not a delivery that you would think would fetch a wicket but then Powell has got his man.
climbs up from short in length, evades the waft and thuds into the ribcage
change of pace and defended to covers
short of length, on the middle and off, tucked to midwicket
slower one and almost trapped in front. It evaded the defensive poke, broke in from the middle and off and hit the pad in front of leg. It would have missed the leg stump
fuller, quicker, straighter and Kapugedera stays back to push at it tentatively
another change of pace but this time Kapugedera picks it up, leans forward to run it down to third man
hurls a bouncer and Kapugedera ducks in a hurry. SL are on 47 for 3
fuller, on a length, around the off stump, Kapugedera doesn't get behind the line, stays adjacent and pushes it to covers
he mixes his bouncers with a few slower ones. Another change of pace this time and is pushed to covers
goes for another bouncer and Udawatte goes down under
short, waist-high, and Udawatte pulls it to deep square leg region
creamed through wide mid-off. Full pitched, outside off and he drove past mid-off, Sarwan gave the chase and tried to stop it with a tumbling drive but ended up pushing it beyond the ropes
fires in a bouncer, pulled limply to short fine-leg. Udawatte seems perennially on the short ones.
drilled through covers. It was the slower one, Udawatte picked it up early and simply killed it to the cover boundary.
on the middle and leg, tried to clip it to square leg, got a leading edge towards mid-off and they rush across for a quick single
here comes another bouncer and he ducks under
on a length, just outside off stump, shapes in, steered to point
yet another slower one - they have been bowling quite a few of 'em- pushed to covers
overpitched but mistimes a drive to right of mid-off for a single
cuts in from outside off, pushed to the off side.
short of length, outside off stump, dabbed to third man for a single
here comes the slower one and he mistimes a drive to covers.
again, another slower one and he doesn't pick this one either. He picks it off the turf and tries to tap it to the leg side and gets a bottom-edge, along the ground, to the keeper
wide down the leg side
drifting down the leg side and is clipped past square leg
almost chopped on to the off stump. It was slanted across him, a tad short in length, and he tried to late cut it but edged it. Anguish for Bravo
well outside the off stump, cut and a miss
outside off, tapped to right of third man
slower one, leans forward to push to cover point for a single
the home boy Sammy runs in - the crowd roar their joy - and lands it outside off, dabbed to third man for a single
full and straight, pushed to covers. SAmmy is all smiles. He knows the crowd is completely behind him.
full pitched, driven to right of mid-off.
huge cheers again as Sammy runs in, this one is outside off and tapped to third man
slow off cutter, outside off, guided to point
on a length, outside off, pushed to cover point for a single
from round the stumps, hurls a bouncer, Udawatte is again late on the pull and can't connect
Another bouncer, on the middle and leg line, this time Udawatte ducks
fuller, outside off stump, sliced to wide third man for a single
a touch short of length, outside off stump, hit on the up to sweeper cover
Walloped over deep midwicket boundary. He picked up the slower one, walked towards the pitch of the delivery outside off and swung it high and over. It was a big hit.
flicks to deep backward square leg for a single
leans forward to tap a delivery close on the off side and they rush across to get the single
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to the local boy Sammy at point who fires in a wild throw at non-striker's end but Bravo does well to stop at mid-on
leans forward to defend to the off side
short of length, outside off stump, swatted to right of mid-on
on the hips, clipped past square leg for a single
overpitches a slower one and Kapugedera picked it up early and eased it straight down the ground
leans across to defend to point
from round the stumps, full and on the off stump line, defended off the front foot
on a length, just outside the off stump, dabbed to backward point region for a quick single
a touch short of length, punched to deepish mid-on region
short in length, punched to the right of Sammy and down to long-off
goes for a change of pace but slips it down the leg side
full pitched, outside off, driven hard but Sammy dives to his left to make the stop. The crowd roar their appreciation.
floated outside off stump, punched to long-off for a single
from round the stumps, floated on the off stump, defended back down the track
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
on the middle, worked to midwicket
slows up the pace ,flights it full, tapped to backward point
on the off and middle, pushed to short midwicket, slight fumble there but no harm done
full and outside off stump, square driven to deep point
from round the stumps, on a length, on the stumps, worked to midwicket
short in length, outside off stump, cut hard to left of backward point where Samuels makes a diving half stop
leans forward to defend to extra cover
just outside off stump, mistimes a cut to backward point
on a length, on the middle and off, punched down the track, Sammy jumps to make the stop. Needless to say, the crowd love it.
slow, well flighted, full, driven to the leg side.
leans forward to whip a full delivery to deep midwicket
slow through the air, outside off, tapped to backward point
on the stumps, slight turn, pushed back to Gayle
short delivery and pulled to deep midwicket
from round the stumps, full and with the angle, defended on the front foot.
punched to long off
the slower one goes awry, wide outside off stump, full toss, hit straight to sweeper cover
full pitched, on the middle and off, driven to long-on
full pitched, outside off stump, driven to long-on for a single
short of length, outside off stump, tapped to third man
short one from round the stumps, goes for the pull but edges it on to the pad and to the off side
a tad short in length, outside off stump, steered to backward point
leans forward to dab to short third man region
from round the stumps, full and slow, driven to long on
leans forward to whip a full delivery past square leg
steps out to a full delivery and whips to midwicket
again comes out but is beaten by the lack of pace and the ball runs off the pad to the off side
leans forward to push to covers
on a length, outside off, cut down to third man for a single
short of length, outside off stump, cut to left of backward point
length delivery outside off stump, pushed towards Sarwan at covers
on the off and middle line, worked to Sarwan
slower one, waits and taps it past square leg for a single
slows up the pace, driven to long-on for a single
leans across to work a full delivery to midwicket
and again. He is still on 49

really slow in the air, on the middle stump, he goes back to work it past square leg. That's his fifty. But he is almost run out, coming back for the second run. The throw was slightly wide off the stumps, Ramdin moves to his right, collects, turns and flicks the ball to the stumps. He slid the bat on the ground, the bat lifted in the air as it was dragged back in but it touched the ground just after it slid in
short and Udawatte rocked back to cut it hard to the backward point boundary
flighted delivery, driven to long on for a single
walks across to the off side, tries to cut a short of length delivery outside off but gets a bottom-edge to the off side. He went too hard at that delivery
slower one, full, defended to the leg side
full and outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
walks to the off side, swipes a full delivery behind square leg and Kapugedera bumps into Sammy as he turns for the second runs, Sammy falls to the ground, Kapu makes it across in time
outside the off stump, cut to third man for a single
leans forward to drive but misses it completely
goes back to cut a full delivery late to third-man region
slow through the air, outside off, full, driven back to Gayle
full and outside off, steered to short third man
quicker, short of length and is cut through backward point region

Gayle has been really slowing the pace down and gets a wicket for his effort. It was a on a length, outside the off stump and stopped and bounced on Kapugedera who was into the drive and ended up patting a dolly back to Gayle. Very soft dismissal.
fullish, outside off stump, driven to right of long on
in the corridor outside off, left alone
gets off the mark with a push to left of covers
swing and a miss. Full in length outside off and Udawatte goes for a big heave over midwicket but fails to connect
short of length, outside off stump, worked past backward point
just outside the off stump, Dilshan is cramped up but manages to cut it past covers
skips down the track to drive to long-off
short of length, outside off, cut to deep point for a single
backs away a touch to get a single with a push to extra cover region
short again and cut to left of  deep backward point
flighted full, leans across to steer to short third-man region for a single.
comes down the track, has to wait as Gayle again slows up the pace and he adjusts to cut to sweeper cover
from round the stumps, full and outside off stump, swung in the air towards long-on
goes over the wickets for the right-handed Dilshan who turns a full delivery to midwicket
slower one outside off, full, square drive to backward point for a quick single
change of pace again, run down to Taylor at third man
tad short in length, just outside off stump, Dilshan cracked it hard to the ground and towards backward point where Samuels fumbles
fuller and driven to long off
flighted outside leg, came down the track, made room and drove inside-out to long-off
fuller and defended to covers
shuffles across and works to square leg
on the middle, turned around the corner, behind square leg,  for a single
slow through the air, flighted outside leg, worked to deep midwicket
leans forward to on drive to long-on for yet another single. SL reach 149 for 4. Drinks on the field.
on a length, on the middle and leg, punched to long-on for a single. 150 is up
full toss outside off, driven to left of extra covers where Sarwan makes a diving stop, recovers to fire in a throw at the striker's end
tries to swipe to the leg side ,edges it close on the leg side and Sammy rushes to the ball but doesn't pick it up cleanly and gives away a single
full pitched on the legs ,flicked to deep backward square leg
a touch short outside off and Dilshan cracks it through backward point. Dilshan has been really busy ever since he has walked in
mistimes a cut to covers
tossed up full, outside off, Dilshan misses to connect with his off drive and it runs off Ramdin's pad to short fine leg
pushed through cover point for a single
lands outside leg, turns in and hits the pad
and again. Udawatte is unable to connect with his flick
moves outside leg, outside the full delivery outside leg and drives to long-on
goes back to work a delivery to right of midwicket where Sammy makes a diving stop and fires in a quick throw to Ramdin
leans forward to tap a length delivery to the leg side, Udawatte wants a single but Dilshan sends him back after seeing Sammy rush to the ball
short in length, on the off, Dilshan backs away to cut to sweeper cover
full and outside off, squeezed to Samuels at backward point
full and outside off, Udawatte tries to square drive, misses, the bat hits the ground and the ball flies to Ramdin
slower one, full and outside off and again Udwatte jams his bat on to the ground as the ball goes past the edge
full and on the leg and middle, picked up in the air and it falls short of deep midwicket. That's the end of Sammy's spell.
on the legs, swung to the leg side
stays back to work it to behind square leg for a single
comes down the track, almost yorks himself and manages to jab it to midwicket
on the middle and off, swung to deep midwicket
on the back foot, punched to long-on
quickish full toss, pushed past covers
fuller on the middle and leg, turned to right of Sarwan at midwicket
in the zone outside off, Udawatte tries to swipe it to the leg side but misses it completely

short of length, cut to covers, both batsmen hesitate after coming out of the crease. Sarwan misses to hit the stumps at non-striker's end and they get across for a single. It was the wrong end to throw as well
short of length, worked to Sarwan at midwicket for a single
yorker length, dug out back to Bravo
leans forward to steer to backward point

Fab work from Ramdin. It was fired in quick, outside leg, Udawatte missed his sweep and Ramdin gathered it and quickly took the bails off as Udawatte dragged his feet outside the crease. Udawatte falls after making 73. Ramdin has had a great day behind the stumps. A very good catch down the leg side and now this.
on the middle stump line, defended to covers
flighted full, driven to long-on
outside off, steers to short third man
leans across to push a full delivery to cover point
loopy slow delivery on the leg and middle, paddled to fine leg
short of length, outside off stump, ball stops on Weeraratne who is early into his pull shot and misses it
slower one from round the stumps, tapped to Sarwan rushing in from covers
short in length and again outside off, gets a bottom-edge to the ground on the cut shot and Ramdin fields
slow loopy delivery, pushed to mid-off for a very quick single. The throw misses the stumps but he would have been in
yorker ends up as a low full toss, driven to long-off
full and well outside off, he can't reach it
leans forward to drive to long-off
full pitched, sliced to sweeper cover
full pitched, on the middle, driven to deep cover
fires in an accurate yorker, stabbed to the off side
low full toss outside off, driven to right of Powell at long-off
full in length, square driven past point for couple of runs.
full and straight, driven back to Bravo
just outside off, driven to covers and they go for the quick single. Gayle's throw misses the stumps and he fell to the ground even as he threw that.
Wow! stunning hit. He walked outside the off stump, waited for the slower one and just picked it up, chipped it effortlessly over deep midwicket.
full and outside off, steered to backward point
slashed to deep cover
overpitched outside off, driven to covers
full in length, driven to long-on
outside the off stump, inside-edges a square drive to short fine-leg
surprise bouncer and Weeraratne ducks.
short of length, climbs outside off stump, arches back to tap it to third man
fuller, quicker, flicked to right of deep midwicket where Morton fields
fires in a very good yorker, just outside off stump, jabbed to third man to Pollard and he runs very hard to come baack for the second run. A direct hit might have been interesting
on a length, around off stump, pushed to covers for a single
slower one ,full and outside off, square driven to backward point where Samuels makes a tumbling stop
length delivery on the middle and off, hit on the up to long-on
yorker on the off and middle, pushed to covers for a single
bangs it short, flat-batted from outside off to long-on
slower one and driven to long-off for yet another single. SL move to 210 for 5
full and on the middle, Dilshan went down on his knee and paddled it up and over the short fine-leg fielder.
short in length, outside off, slashed to third man
full and outside off, swing and a miss.
low full toss, pulled without much power to deep midwicket
Another play and a miss. It was outside off, Dilshan went for a big heave across the line but ..
low dipping full toss, turned to deep midwicket
tries a slower one but slips it down the leg side and its lapped around the corner past the short fine-leg fielder.
yorker outside off, stabbed to short third man region for a single. That's his fifty. A very good innings.
run out chance missed. Weeraratne mistimed a pull shot to Smith at midwicket and he is well short of the crease but Smith, substituting for Gayle, missed
Swung over long-on. Full and in the slot, heaved cleanly over the ropes. SL are on the move here. Three overs left.
hit to deep backward square leg region
Cheeky paddle over the short fine-leg fielder. He fetched it from outside off and helped it over. He moves to 55.
on the middle and leg, he moved outside leg and pushed to cover point.
beaten by the slower one. Short in length and cutting away from the off stump, Weeraratne went for a pull to midwicket region but didnt' connect
quite similar delivery, again Weeraratne is early into his pull but manages to swat this one to midwicket
Shout for lbw as Dilshan misses a heave across the line and is hit on the pad. Going down leg, though
short in length, well outside off stump, Weeraratne reached out and got a thick edge to his intended steer to thirdman and it went finer than he aimed. Partly steered, partly edged.
from round the stumps, full one, Dilshan went for a one almighty swing to midwicket region, top edged it towards mid-on, Bravo ran after it and dived full stretch but couldn't reach
Wallop! He cleared the front leg and swung a full delivery over long-on. Sri Lanka reach 250. Dilshan is turning it on here.

caught at long on. He tried to repeat the stroke but is caught near the ropes. But it has been a very good effort from Dilshan. He kept taking singles at the start, rotated the strike very well before exploding in the end.
slower one, off the pads towards square
full and outside off, swing and a miss
on a driveable length, on the leg and middle, picked up to right of deep midwicket. Six legal deliveries left.
fullish, gives the strike back to Weeraratne with a push to covers
moves outside leg, tries to go inside-out over covers and edges the length delivery to third man
off cutter, cut to point for a single. Three runs in this over so far.
he moved outside off - way outside actually - and couldn't connect with his paddle shot and is cleaned up. Valuable contribution, though. A breezy 41.
short delivery and he swings at it but misses completely

Chaotic end! Two direct hits! The batsman missed a full delivery but ran for the bye. Ramdin's throw missed the stumps, Taylor picked it up, turned around and broke  the stumps at the non-striker's end. They run for the rebound. Another direct hit, from Ramdin, comes at the striker's end. Taufel takes the safe route and goes to the third umpire who rules that Taylor's throw had caught the batsman short. Phew!. So no run off the final ball.

inn2.comm: first delivery is angled across Chattergoon who shoulders arms
again slanted across and is left alone
full in length, around the off stump, pushed to point. Windies need 258 to win
angling across the batsman who shoulders arms
short of length, around the off stump, punched to mid-off
full and outside off, slashed over Silva at gully, down to wide third man
swinging delivery around the off stump line, pushed to covers
similar line, he gets behind the line to push it towards mid-off
on the middle stump line, not much swing, Chattergoon waits on the ball before pushing it through wide mid-on
outswinger outside off, left alone
gets right behind the line of a length delivery and defends to covers
a sharp bouncer and Morton quickly ducks
cuts in from a length, evades the defensive poke and thuds into the pad, would have missed the leg stump, though
gets forward to defend to the off side
full and on the middle and off, squeezed off the inner edge to square leg
full, on the middle stump line, pushed to Weeraratne at mid-off and he ran with the stroke
another bouncer - even the West Indies new-ball bowlers used it a few times and successfully at that - ducked under
on a length, around the off stump, defended to mid-on
curving away from Chattergoon who places it to the cover region.

slower one, full and just outside off stump, Chattergoon lunged forward and lofted it high and over mid-on. Morton was slightly slow in turning for the third run but made it just in time to beat the throw
lands on a length, on the middle, straightens and Morton brings his bat down in a hurry to jab it away.
a touch short in length, angling away and Morton stands tall and forces it off the back foot through covers
fuller, on a length, moving away from Morton who taps it to third man for a single
moves in with the angle, beats the intended clip shot and crashes into the pad
short of length and again Morton stands tall to punch it elegantly to mid-off
short and width offered there and Chattergoon cuts loose with a cracking square cut
he cleared the front foot and crashed a length delivery on the up, through the line and between the bowler and the mid-off.
leans forward to drive to mid-on and rushes across for a quick single.
short of length, around the off stump, pushed down the track
lands on a length, on the middle and off, curves in a touch , worked to midwicket
fires in an inswinging yorker, just about stabbed away.
lovely punchy stroke through covers. Again, he stood up tall and fisted it off the back foot.
on a length, around the off stump and drives pleasingly to mid-off

Slashed to third man. He walked down the track and had a ugly heave across the line to a length delivery outside off and topedged it. You would have thought this was a free hit, the way he went after that ball

edged past the diving Sangakkara. It was a length delivery just outside the off stump and Chattergoon tried to punch it through cover point. The edge saw the ball flying between Sanga and the first slip, standing wide,  and he dived but couldn't reach it
on a length, around the off stump, punched back to the bowler
dropped by Weeraratne at mid-on. Full in length, on the off stump line, Morton drove it hard and Weeraratne seemed surprised at the velocity and was late on the jump. The ball burst of his palms
driven to the on side
leans across to defend to point
The white ball has disappeared over midwicket boundary. It was short, it was inviting and Chattergoon obliged by pulling it.
fuller and Chattergoon leans into his drive, times sweetly but hits straight to covers. Tremendous buzz around the arena
on a length, around the off stump, defended to covers
goes for the yorker, ends as a low full toss, driven to wide mid-on
length delivery on the off stump, not much movement, pushed to covers
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
unfurls a fab straight drive. It was full and on the stumps, Chatters eased it straight down the ground.
Murder! Slightly short in length, outside off stump and Chattergoon slaps it past point. West Indies are galloping under lights. The crowd love it.
Mirando strikes immediately. Off his first delivery in his first ODI game. He angled it across Morton who went for a on-the-up drive and nicked it.
on the middle and leg, turned to right of midwicket
outside off, a tad short and Chattergoon goes for his favourite cut shot but doesn't connect
goes on the back foot and punches it to covers
connects with his cut shot this time but made contact with the bottom-half of the bat as he reached out for a wide delivery and picks up two to deep backward point region
goes back and across to punch to the off side
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, pushed to the off side and Kulasekara makes the stop
from wide of the crease, angling in towards the off stump, pushed to covers
gets forward to a similar delivery and defends to the cover region.
on the middle and off, again from that round-the-stumps angle, defended down the track
fuller, going for the yorker, falls short of the blockhole and driven to covers
defended to covers. That round the stumps angle working for Kulasekara.
well outside off and a swing and a miss results
a tad short in length, outside the off stump and he hit it on the up through covers. There was a short cover and a extra cover in place but he bisected 'em.
on the middle stump line, pushed back
fuller, on the middle and off, wristed to wide midwicket region
length delivery, on the middle and off and Chattergoon gets right behind the line to play a compact defensive stroke
from over the stumps to the right-handed Sarwan and lands it on the off stump line, defended to covers
just outside off stump and steered to third man
top-edged over the 'keeper's head. Short and outside off stump, Chattergoon went for a pull and edged it high over Sanga and it ran away to the third man boundary
fuller in length, tucked to square leg for a single
short in length, on the off stump line, guided to backward point
on the off stump line, dabbed to third man
full and just outside off stump, driven to covers. That was well timed but he couldn't find the gap
shorter and is cut hard but straight to Mahela at backward point
angled across Sarwan who went hard at his on-the-up cover drive and got an inside edge past the stumps to fine leg
short of length, on the middle and off stump line, defended solidly to covers
yorker just outside leg stump, turned to short fine-leg
he knocks out the bails at the point of release, hurls a fullish delivery across, square driven to point
Sangakkara stands up to the stumps. Vaas sends down a length delivery outside off, run down to third man
opens the bat-face and guides a full delivery to point
on a length and punched off the back foot to covers
Twhack! Chattergoon opened his stance and swung a length delivery through wide midwicket and Udawatte makes a fine diving stop near the ropes.
slower one, tucked to right of mid-on
leans forward to defend.
short in length, slow off the track and Sarwan mistimes a forcing shot off the back foot and the ball rolls back down the track.
jumps out of the crease and Mirando pushes it well outside off stump. Wide called. Harsh call, there.
short in length, outside off, cut to cover point region for a quick single. Had it been a direct hit he would have got Chattergoon who dived into his crease but it was a wild throw
fuller, straighter, turned to midwicket
full in length, angled across Sarwan who mistimes yet another cover drive back to the bowler. The bat handle turned in his hands
short of length, outside off, cut hard to the ground and to point
leans forward to push to mid-off
came in with the angle, off the inside edge on to the flap of the pad. Sanga appeals and Taufel turns it down.
leans forward to push to covers
a touch short in length, outside off stump, Chattergoon goes for his favourite square cut and edges it. Sangakkara, standing up to the stumps, takes a sharp catch. West Indies lose their openers
shuffles across and has a lame poke at a delivery leaving him
outside off stump, gets off the mark with a dab to third man
on the middle stump line, turned to square leg
angled across Samuels who watches it sail into Sanga's gloves
And again
punches a length delivery to point.
short in length, cracked to point where Dilshan intercepts.
shuffles across to guide to short-of-length delivery to Dilshan
slanted across Sarwan who runs it down to third man
around that off stump, steered to third man
leans across to jab a length delivery off the inner edge to the on side. Sanga rushes after it to prevent the single
turns it to midwicket
a tad slower and guided to backward point
leans forward to defend
full in length, angling across, steered to the backward point region.
